subject: College Athletics
Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Connecticut honored its slain teammate Jasper Howard with tributes, then lost a thriller to Rutgers on an 81-yard touchdown with 22 seconds left.
snippet: Connecticut honored its slain teammate Jasper Howard with tributes, then lost a thriller to Rutgers on an 81-yard touchdown with 22 seconds left.
